ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities include fixing duplicate wording on the holidays newspost and merging pull requests to address similar issues, showcasing a focus on refining the wiki's content for better user experience.

ppy/osu-tools.summary: The repository has seen significant updates with the addition of an option to populate score parameters on the SimulateScreen using score ID, enhancing the tool's functionality and user interaction.

ppy/osu.summary: A notable update includes the implementation of the ability to mark a beatmap as played, which is a key feature for user engagement and beatmap management within the osu ecosystem.

ppy/osu-server-beatmap-submission.summary: Efforts to improve observability are underway with the integration of Sentry and Datadog, along with extended logging, aiming to enhance the server's performance and issue tracking capabilities.

ppy/osu-web.summary: A pull request aims to include user tags in beatmapset searches, which would require a new beatmap search index, indicating a push towards more personalized and efficient search functionalities within the osu web platform.
